code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Header from'../Components/Header';import CategoryNav from'../Components/CategoryNav';import Filters from'../Components/Filters';import ProductGrid from'../Components/ProductGrid';import CartSidebar from'../Components/CartSidebar';import CartOverlay from'../Components/CartOverlay';import Modal from'../Components/Modal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[cartOpen,setCartOpen]=useState(false);const[selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory]=useState('');const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);const[modalProduct,setModalProduct]=useState(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 font-sans",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{cartItems:cartItems,onCartToggle:()=>setCartOpen(true)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CategoryNav,{onCategorySelect:setSelectedCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filters,{category:selectedCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductGrid,{category:selectedCategory,setModalProduct:setModalProduct})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartSidebar,{open:cartOpen,onClose:()=>setCartOpen(false),cartItems:cartItems,setCartItems:setCartItems}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartOverlay,{open:cartOpen,onClose:()=>setCartOpen(false)}),modalProduct&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{product:modalProduct,onClose:()=>setModalProduct(null),addToCart:product=>{setCartItems([...cartItems,product]);setModalProduct(null);}})]});};export default Home;
